name: getDeleteMssqlDbRecoverableRangesStatusV1
description: Get the details of the progress made in deleting recoverable ranges. The recoverable ranges to delete are those specified by the DELETE request to /mssql/db/{id}/recoverable_range/download which yielded the response with the job id.

id.description: Job ID of the deletion for which to check progress.

$ul: **archived**: Whether this job instance has been archived.
**childJobDebugInfo**: Some job types create other 'child' jobs to perform their work. Here we show information on how this job is being affected by its child jobs (if any).
**endTime**: End time of the job instance.
**errorInfo**: Error information of the job instance.
**isDisabled**: Whether this job is disabled or not.
**jobProgress**: The current progress in terms of percentage of the async request.
**nodeId**: ID of the node where the job runs.
**result**: Result of the job instance. Its meaning depends on the job type but is usually an ID.
**startTime**: Start time of the job instance.
